title: paavana thirthapadha
sahitya:
pAvana tIrthapAda shAntAkAra pAhi mAm vidyAdirAja vidAmbara

anupallavi

 bhAvanAtIta kAruNya dhArAdhara bhAvuka dAyaka bhadravArAkara

caraNam

 mukti muni pravara hima dhavalAmbara mUrta tapObhara vijnAna bhAskara 
bhakta mandAra vishuddha yOgIshvara bhaTTaraka vana tulasImaNi hAra
